central.description: You are in the main area of the library, where there is a door to the east and an open path to the north.

janitor.description: You are in the janitors room, the light bulb is very dim and the area is small.

computer.description: You are in the computer lab of the library, this is the best place to do online research.

reading.description: You are in the reading room, where there is a door to both your East and West.
